text: If there was a way to turn off notifications for website/form actions for individual contacts or even an email domain, that would be so nice. I can think of a dozen use cases for that kind of thing off the top of my head. I put <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/Disable-notifications-based-on-Contact-Name-or-Email-Domain/idi-p/408091|something in the ideas forum>, would love to see some support if you want the same feature!
